alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 8:51PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pima County through 945 PM MST... At 851 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles north of Pisinemo, or 31 miles southeast of Ajo, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pisinemo, Gu Vo, Hickiwan, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument, San Simon, Charco 27, Ventana, Gunsight, Vaya Chin, Santa Cruz, Kuakatch and San Simon West. This includes Route 86 between mile markers 56 and 88. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument
